rows.label: qst710201_msg0001
rows.name:
Sorry, but there's not a
single fish here. If you
want fish, look elsewhere.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0002
rows.name:
You saw it, right? It's all
because of those minions of
the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0003
rows.name:
They had something like glowing
wings on their backs, right?

rows.label: qst710201_msg0004
rows.name:
For some reason, all the fish that
were hit by that light died...

rows.label: qst710201_msg0006
rows.name:
I want to fill this pail with
fish again, little by little,
and restart the farm.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0007
rows.name:
...Say, if you catch any fish,
could you give them to me?

rows.label: qst710201_msg0008
rows.name:
I want to collect all sorts of
fish, but I've realized there's
a limit to what I can do alone.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0009
rows.name: Well then, I'm counting on you.
